text: was a Japanese biochemist. He was known for his research on chemical carcinogens. He received the Japan Prize his research on the causes of cancer.Dr. Takashi Sugimura 1997 (13th) Japan Prize Laureate He was elected as President of the Japan Academy on October 15, 2013.日本学士院長の選定について Selection of President of the Japan Academy Sugimura died on September 6, 2020 from heart failure in Tokyo at the age of 94.国立がんセンター名誉総長の杉村隆氏死去 ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from heart failure Category:Japanese chemists Category:Japanese biologists
title: Takashi Sugimura
